overview: Featuring a variety of holiday-themed episodes from everyoneâ€™s favorite sea-dwelling sponge. Included are the double-length episodes "Christmas Who," as well as "Procrastination," "The Snowball Effect," "Survival of the Idiots," "Mermaidman and Barnacleboy IV," "Chocolate With Nuts," "As Seen on TV," "Pizza Delivery" and "The Squeaky Boots."
title: SpongeBob Squarepants: Christmas
